data.title: Krista Allen Is Announced As Newest Official Ambassador For Cybersmile – Cybersmile
data.text:
We are very proud to announce Hollywood actress Krista Allen as Cybersmile’s newest Official Ambassador. Krista will work alongside a diverse range of Ambassadors including Hollywood actors and actresses, World Gaming Champions, Billboard and MTV Award Winning musicians and influential fashion/beauty celebrities. Krista and the rest of the team will help in raising awareness to the problem of cyberbullying, while amplifying the Cybersmile message of hope and support to millions of people around the world.

“I decided to work with Cybersmile because there’s not a person in the world who isn’t going through something challenging. Cyberbullying is designed to hurt people. It is my hope that offering my time to this organization can help make someone’s world a safer and more loving place.”

Krista Allen, Official Cybersmile Ambassador

Krista’s positive and uplifting social media use and her genuine desire to make a real difference in the world, makes us absolutely delighted to welcome her to the team! We can’t wait to start changing lives together (If you’d like to make a huge difference to peoples lives check out our get involved section).

These are very exciting times at Cybersmile HQ! With our growing team of influential Ambassadors, fully trained support advisors on standby 24 hours per day, and a vast network of volunteers around the world, you can rest assured that Cybersmile will be giving vital help and support to more victims of cyberbullying and digital abuse than ever before! If you are being affected by abuse online check out our Cyberbullying and Digital Abuse Help Center or review our Total Access Support Services. For further information about Cybersmile and the work we do please explore the following suggestions.

Who Are Cybersmile?

Official Cybersmile Ambassadors
